TAO HOLLAND

  1. ABOUT |
  2. WORK |
  3. CONTACT |

PROJECT OBJECTIVE

The objective was to create a branding identity for a theatre company. The theatre itself is known for its ivy vines encompassing the entire building. The brand was built around that visual que.

DESIGN

The logo itself is made up of the visual representation of the Ivy vine, the Iconic theatre tragedy mask and the stage lights. The logo is simplistic and modern while still staying true to the authenticity of the theatre itself.

PITCH

In reality I did not have the experience or the time to do this project. This was one of the first motion projects we did and was my first attempt at stop motion. The clay I bought was cheap, and although it said that it was not quick dry, it dried almost immediately which meant I had to cut the story short and move quickly. I immediately changed my aesthetic to a grungy world.
